subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kasey Kahne won the Toyota/SaveMart 350 at Infineon Raceway to give his car owner Richard Petty his first victory since April 1999.
snippet: Kasey Kahne won the Toyota/SaveMart 350 at Infineon Raceway to give his car owner Richard Petty his first victory since April 1999.
